snippet: The High Court ruled that forensic evidence offered by prosecutors in the case against Anwar Ibrahim, the opposition leader, was unreliable.
abstract: Malaysia's High Court acquits opposition leader Anwar Ibrahim of sodomy charges, saying that the evidence was unreliable; ruling ends a politically charged two-year trial.
lead_paragraph: The High Court ruled that forensic evidence offered by prosecutors in the case against Anwar Ibrahim, the opposition leader, was unreliable.

headline.seo: Malaysia Court Acquits Anwar Ibrahim of Sodomy Charge
headline.main: Malaysian Opposition Leader Acquitted in Sodomy Trial
headline.print_headline: Politician In Malaysia Is Acquitted Of Sodomy
